pageContext.claim: “We don't want people to make political statements or do it for political reasons. They think it's going to be good for them politically, so they keep the schools closed. No way.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is falsely accusing state and local officials of wanting to keep schools closed for political reasons. Many are struggling to find a way to open schools while protecting the health of students and teachers. For political reasons -- ie, his re-election campaign -- Trump is trying to instill a sense of normalcy.
